##Wave plot
```{r}
x <- seq(0,20, by = 0.01)
y <- sin(x)
sin_df <-data.frame(x,y)
head(sin_df,3)


plot(sin_df$x, sin_df$y, 
  type="l", #stand for line and connect the points
  main="Wave plot", #the title of plot
  xlab="x", 
  ylab="sin(x)")
